overview: Recorded in the Coyote Gulch canyons of Utah, Echolocations: Canyon is first in a series of short films and recordings which document site specific compositions performed by Andrew Bird in exceptional natural and urban environments.  A Companion piece to Bird's instrumental album of the same name.
tagline: Whatever sound you make it's like a giant limb that can reach beyond your fingers and grope the corners of the room.
title: Echolocations: Canyon
